text: The Screen Award for Best Actress (Critics) is an Indian cinema award. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" style="width:98%;" |- style="background:#bebebe;" !style="width:10%;"| Year !style="width:30%;"| Winner !style="width:30%;"| Film |- |-bgcolor=#edf3fe | 2007 ||Ayesha Takia||Dor |- | 2008 || Tabu || Cheeni Kum |-bgcolor=#edf3fe | 2016 || Kalki Koechlin || Margarita with a Straw |- | 2017 || Swara Bhaskar || Nil Battey Sannata |-bgcolor=#edf3fe | 2018 || Konkona Sen Sharma || Lipstick Under My Burkha |- | 2019 || Neena Gupta || Badhaai Ho |-bgcolor=#edf3fe |} * Winners are listed first in bold, followed by the other nominees. * 2020– Taapsee Pannu (tied with) Bhumi Pednekar – Saand Ki Aankh ** Priyanka Chopra Jonas – The Sky Is Pink ** Bhumi Pednekar – Bala ** Richa Chadha – Section 375 ==See also== * Screen Awards * Bollywood * Cinema of India ==References== Category:Screen Awards Category:Film awards for lead actress
title: Screen Award for Best Actress (Critics)
